  • Field Details

    • levelTileMap

      public LevelTileMap levelTileMap
      levelTileMap is the tilemap used for the game. It doesn't include the shop.

    • enemyList

      public ArrayList<Enemy> enemyList
      The enemyList is an ArrayList of all the enemies that will be spawned during a round of the game.

    • spawnedEnemyList

      public ArrayList<Enemy> spawnedEnemyList
      The spawnedEnemyList is an ArrayList of all the enemies that are spawned during the current round and that are still alive. These are the enemies that will be targeted.

    • towers

      public ArrayList<Tower> towers
      Towers is an ArrayList of all the towers that are placed in the game.

    • coinCounter

      public Counter coinCounter
      The coinCounter shows the current money that the player has.

    • pointCounter

      public Counter pointCounter
      The pointCounter shows the current points that the player has.

    • liveCounter

      public Counter liveCounter
      The liveCounter shows the current lives that the player has.

    • roundCounter

      public Counter roundCounter
      The roundCounter shows the current round of the game.

    • coins

      public static int coins
      Coins is the variable that keeps the amount of coins.

    • points

      public static int points
      Points is the variable that keeps the amount of points.

    • lives

      public static int lives
      Lives is the variable that keeps the amount of lives.

    • currentRound

      public Round currentRound
      The currentRound is the variable that keeps which round is currently being played.

    • nextRound

      public boolean nextRound
      the boolean nextRound becomes true when the next round can start.

    • enemyListNr

      public int enemyListNr
      The enemyListNr is a variable that connects to the spawnEnemyList. It is used to decide which enemy to spawn.

    • spawnEnemies

      public boolean spawnEnemies
      This boolean becomes true when an enemies is supposed to spawn.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameScreen

      public GameScreen(BonkTheTowerTD bonkTheTowerTD)
      GameScreen is the screen where you can play the game.
      Parameters:
      BonkTheTower: this is the game itself.

  • Method Details

    • setupScene

      public void setupScene()
      This method sets up everthing in the scene, including the background color and background music.
      Specified by:
      setupScene in interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes.YaegerScene

    • setupEntities

      public void setupEntities()
      This sets up all the entities that are visible when you first open the game screen.
      Specified by:
      setupEntities in interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes.YaegerScene

    • setupEntitySpawners

      public void setupEntitySpawners()
      This method adds all the entitySpawners to GameScreen.
      Specified by:
      setupEntitySpawners in interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.EntitySpawnerContainer

    • setupTileMaps

      public void setupTileMaps()
      This method adds the tile maps to the GameScreen
      Specified by:
      setupTileMaps in interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes.TileMapContainer

    • enemyPastBorder

      public void enemyPastBorder(Enemy e, int damage)
      This method checks if an enemy is past the borders of the game. If this is true, the enemy gets deleted and erased from the spawnEnemiesList.
      Specified by:
      setupTileMaps in interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes.TileMapContainer
      Parameters:
      Enemy enemy: The enemy that gets checked.
      int damage: The damage that enemy does.

    • explicitUpdate

      public void explicitUpdate(long l)
      This method runs the entire time GameScreen is active. It includes different methods that need to be checked constantly. It also checks the round and the amount of lives to see if the game has ended.
      Specified by:
      explicitUpdate in interface com.github.hanyaeger.api.UpdateExposer

    • spawnEnemies

      public void spawnEnemy()
      This method spawns an enemy from the ArrayList spawnEnemiesList. It is called in explicitUpdate() and includes a timer.

    • changingTileMap

      public void changingTileMap()
      This method changes the tile map used for the game. It changes the grass in the game to ground you can select for placing towers and back.

    • resetStartingVariables

      public void resetStartingVariables()
      This method resets all the variables and the tile map, so you can play again.

    • gameOver

      public void gameOver()
      This method sets the finalMessage and changes the screen to the FinalScreen.

    • enoughMoney

      public boolean enoughMoney(String towerName)
      This method checks if you have enough money to place the tower you want.
      Parameters:
      String towerName: this is the name of the tower you want to place. It is used to find how expensive it is.

    • placeTower

      public void placeTower(com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D mouseCoordinates)
      This method handles the entire action of placing a tower. It gets the coordinates

    • onMouseButtonReleased

      public void onMouseButtonReleased(javafx.scene.input.MouseButton mouseButton, com.github.hanyaeger.api.Coordinate2D coordinate2D)
      Specified by:

      public double pathLimit(int tile)

    • enemiesPath

      public void enemiesPath()
